channel.title: Hacked?
channel.description: This is just a question that came to mind, has anyone ever hacked runescape? like I know that there is some retards that say they can... but has there been word of anyone ever hacking them for real?

item.title: Hacked?
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

ytuio9:

One day a person wanted help coding his rsps so he decided to hack into rs but he needed help to kdnap the CEO of jagex and force them to give him the source.

He asked if you could jail the CEO of Jagex in your basement

Read full topic

item.title: Hacked?
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:34, topic:414710”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=516672.msg3751740#msg3751740 date=1316085415]
What if you could get it to spam the packet of a quest reward? Then if a quest gives like 25k gold and some skill XP just mass spam it?
[/quote]
Please be a troll, just please! Idiocracy you can’t take reyx!

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DueSvcjn810&feature=related[/youtube][/quote]

It was just a guess, I don’t much about this. Why must you always troll me?

Read full topic

item.title: Hacked?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

[quote=“jme, post:9, topic:388944”][quote author=Unhandled link=topic=484762.msg3555880#msg3555880 date=1301876645]

machine learning algorithms that recognize obfuscated bytecode structures?

wtf? elaborate on that?

oh i dont actually know what im talking about i just like to string together big words to sound smart.

it works 2/3 times.
[/quote]

While scanning the lunix server(which runescape is ran on), I came across a java hack that confuses the kernal
[size=6pt](sorry ollie)[/size][/quote]

[quote=“Cain_”][quote author=Killer-99-pkz link=topic=24106.msg2639244#msg2639244 date=1232748679]
You’d be better off not making your own Java dev kit becuase java uses c++ (oviously) as a virtual machine so, most of Java’s internal use depends on it. only way you could do what your doing is use Java’s preset native’s. Besides the jdk package is only large becuase of the source bunble. Anyhow, greate job I hope you get far with this.
[/quote]

while scanning the lunix server(which runescape is ran on), I came across a java hack that confuses the kernal.[/quote]

This was scam hat was posted all over the internet that says if you send your username and password to a certain e-mail you can hack an account.

Read full topic

item.title: Hacked?
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:27, topic:414710”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=516672.msg3752114#msg3752114 date=1316125000]

Anything can be hacked, Jagex has extensive security to say the least though, could still be done if you got a trojen through one of their emails and they downloaded it.

Good point, but no way in hell your gonna get me to try it, way to big of fines for that crap…

Well if you know how to spoof and know about VPN’s you wont get caught. I bet you at least one of the people working there has someone named “mom” in their address book, play off that.
[/quote]
Lol I wouldn’t hack them for freaking game, and I’m not interested in taking money atm[/quote]
Hacking is a sport in my mindset, more like hunting a deer then taking money.

Read full topic

item.title: Hacked?
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

ytuio9:

One day a person wanted help coding his rsps so he decided to hack into rs but he needed help to kdnap the CEO of jagex and force them to give him the source.

God that kid was stupid, I saw that thread…

[quote=“Runescape-Xperia, post:15, topic:414710”][quote author=tyb97 link=topic=516672.msg3751382#msg3751382 date=1316048662]
Lol I love that episode… but I just got bored and tried for like the millionth time to use cheat engine on rs, and its detected so bad… I got it to give me 1mil frm 282gp, and while searching for a bug for it to save my money, my epicbot shut down…
[/quote]
Explain more, how did you get it to give money.[/quote]
Epicbot+Cheat Engine, and you know how to work cheat engine it will let you. But Cheat engine is really detectable by rs, rs will close if you stay in cheat engine too long, so while searching for a method to make the money real, it just shuts down

Read full topic
